hadiths.text: Narrated Maimuna:The Prophet (ﷺ) used to pray while I used to sleep beside him during my periods (menses) and in prostration his garment used to touch me

chapter.ara-name: باب إِذَا صَلَّى إِلَى فِرَاشٍ فِيهِ حَائِضٌ
chapter.eng-name: To offer Salat (prayer) facing a bed occupied by a menstruatng woman
